titles.title: 701 Hallelujah! Christ Is Victor (easy familiar ni

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
verse 1
Hallelujah! Christ is Victor
Tell with every breath
That the Saviour still is conqu'or
Over sin and death

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Christ is Victor
Tell wher'er you go
That the Lord
Is still the Conqu'ror
Over every foe

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Christ is Victor
Pain and sickness flee,
When we plead the mighty victory
Won on Calvary.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Christ is Victor
Therefore do and dare
Go wherever Jesus sends you
In prevailing prayer

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Christ is Victor
No defeat nor fear
Evermore must dim thy vision
Christ the way will clear

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Christ is Victor
Soon His voice shall ring
"Come ye conqu'rors
Come up hither
Join thy conquering King."
